name: DEALER (itch)
description:
The drug dealers will have a target to deliver drugs in U-bahn station. 

The police is there to catch drug dealers.

The drug dealers try to find their way to the customer without being caught by the police.

Credits: 

Created by Veronica Kwok

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences Berlin.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai

"Games A Week" (Winter Semester 2020/21)
